snippet: The raid in eastern Belgium also left a third person gravely injured, as the authorities stepped up their efforts against extremists.
abstract: Series of raids against suspected terrorists across Belgium results in police killing two suspects in gun battle; officials say targets of raids had joined Islamic extremist groups and were plotting 'imminent' attacks in country.

byline.contributor: Alison Smale contributed reporting from Berlin, and Andrew Higgins from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The raid in eastern Belgium also left a third person gravely injured, as the authorities stepped up their efforts against extremists.

headline.main: 2 Suspects Killed in Gun Battle in Belgian Antiterror Raid
headline.print_headline: 2 Suspects Killed in Gun Battle in Belgian Antiterror Raid
